name: Yummy Shakes
description:
Do you like tasty shake or frappe? The studio is promoting their drinks, if you can help them make more milk shakes, slushes or frappes for the customers, you will be rewarded!

Sounds great? The steps are easy, choose the same flavor and cream shapes at first, then put the same toppings on the cream.

That's it! You really did a good job, now make as many drinks as you can!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Plenty of flavors, cream shapes and toppings are prepared
* No time limited, enjoy yourself
